title: A Marriage with Mojo, Volume 9, The Adventures of Anabel Axelrod
description: “This marriage biz is a snap!”With a couple months of wedded bliss under her belt, Anabel wonders why she was ever so wary to believe in a monogamous, long-term relationship. Back in her happy place of working long hours in the store by day and pleasing her sexy husband for long hours by night, Anabel’s never been more satisfied in her life. Even helping friends in turmoil, tracking down cheating boyfriends, dealing with one scary pregnant sister-in-law and one very scary, persistent job offer doesn’t put a dent in Anabel’s post-honeymoon delirium.But then reports start coming in from her Northfield Network that a hugely pregnant stranger is waddling around town. Anabel agrees that sounds terribly uncomfortable but doesn’t see the significance to her...until the first reports are followed up with the whispered gossip Luke Drake's the baby daddy! As Anabel investigates the shocking rumors, not only is her bubble of happiness dented, it's burst wide open in a torrent of mind-blowing questions.In the tumultuously tantalizing A Marriage with Mojo, Volume 9 in The Adventures of Anabel Axelrod ongoing series, there's only one thing Anabel’s sure of in her shiny, new marriage to Luke Drake - the honeymoon is definitely over!Reserve your preorder copy today of A Marriage with Mojo.
author: Tracy Ellen
